GSD.attack_vector: processing untrusted input containing too big exponent string
GSD.credit: Found independently by [disconnect3d from Trail of Bits](https://github.com/disconnect3d/) and by https://github.com/MakotoE (https://github.com/zeta12ti/parse_duration/pull/18)
